```{python}
def get_split_type(path: str) -> str:
    path_str = str(path)
    if "/raw_data_validation/" in path_str:
        return "val"
    elif "/validation/" in path_str:
        return "val"
    elif "/testing/" in path_str:
        return "test"
    elif "/raw_data/" in path_str or "/training/" in path_str:
        return "train"
    else:
        return "unknown"


def get_label(path):
    path_obj = Path(path)
    parts = path_obj.parts

    for i, part in enumerate(parts):
        if part in ["raw_data", "raw_data_validation", "training", "validation", "testing"]:
            if i + 1 < len(parts):
                return parts[i + 1]

    return "unknown"
```

```{python}
CUTOFF = 0.1
cutoff_df = df.filter(pl.col("distance") < CUTOFF)
cutoff_df = cutoff_df.with_columns(
    [
        pl.col("sample_id_1").map_elements(get_split_type, return_dtype=pl.Utf8).alias("split_1"),
        pl.col("sample_id_2").map_elements(get_split_type, return_dtype=pl.Utf8).alias("split_2"),
        pl.col("sample_id_1").map_elements(get_label, return_dtype=pl.Utf8).alias("label_1"),
        pl.col("sample_id_2").map_elements(get_label, return_dtype=pl.Utf8).alias("label_2"),
    ]
)
cutoff_df = cutoff_df.filter(
    (pl.col("label_1") == pl.col("label_2"))
    & (
        ((pl.col("split_1") == "train") & (pl.col("split_2").is_in(["val", "test"])))
        | ((pl.col("split_2") == "train") & (pl.col("split_1").is_in(["val", "test"])))
    )
)
print(f"Samples in the cutoff: {cutoff_df.height:,}")

samples = cutoff_df.sample(8)
num_images = len(samples) * 2

num_cols = 2
num_rows = int(math.ceil(num_images / num_cols))

fig_width = num_cols * 6
fig_height = num_rows * 3

plt.figure(figsize=(fig_width, fig_height))
for i, row in enumerate(samples.iter_rows(named=True)):
    i *= 2
    img1_path = row["sample_id_1"]
    img2_path = row["sample_id_2"]
    dist = row["distance"]
    ax1 = plt.subplot(num_rows, num_cols, i + 1)
    ax2 = plt.subplot(num_rows, num_cols, i + 2)

    print("Row:", i // 2 + 1)
    print("Image 1:", img1_path)
    print("Image 2:", img2_path)
    img1 = Image.open(img1_path)
    img2 = Image.open(img2_path)
    ax1.imshow(img1)
    ax2.imshow(img2)
    ax1.set_title(f"{i//2+1}: {Path(img1_path).name} ({dist:.4f})")
    ax2.set_title(Path(img2_path).name)
    ax1.axis("off")
    ax2.axis("off")

plt.tight_layout()
```
